formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
Action: ModuleCheck Synopsis: Check if module is loaded Privilege: system,all Description: Checks if Asterisk module is loaded Variables: ActionID: <id> Action ID for this transaction. Will be returned. Module: <name> Asterisk module name (not including extension)
Will return Success/Failure For success returns, the module revision number is included.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
